titleInfo.title: Original wills, Alexander, B. F., 1911 March 06

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: An original will of B. F. Alexander, dated July 30th, 1910. Illustrates the first page of the document. Alexanderâ€™s will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on March 6th, 1911. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
